湺字的基本解释

湺
xián
古同“涎”。

湺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xián］
［《廣韻》夕連切，平仙，邪。］
亦作“湺1”。亦作“1”。
(1)唾液，口水。
(2)指流口水。
(3)贪羡，贪图。
(4)吐；流。参见“涎縷”、“涎玉沫珠”。
(5)粘液；浆汁。
(6)（眼神）呆滞。
(7)贪馋地盯视。
(8)厚着脸皮；嬉皮笑脸。
(9)拖；伸。
(10)见“涎漫”。

湺字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【巳集】【水字部】　湺； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页639第11
【五音篇海】音涎。?字之譌。

湺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
湺字的起名意思

暂无。

Xiao
Basic explanation of words
Xiao
xián
Gu Tong "saliva".
Xiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xián］
["Guangyun" Xilian cut, flat immortal, evil. ]
Also known as "湺1". Also known as "1".
(1) Saliva, saliva.
(2) Refers to drooling.
(3) Greedy, greedy.
(4) Spit; flow. See "saliva thread", "saliva jade foam beads".
(5) Mucus; pulp juice.
(6) (eyes) dullness.
(7) Staring greedily.
(8) Cheeky; hippie smiley.
(9) Drag; stretch.
(10) See "Salivation Man".
Xiao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Remarks] [Silhouettes] [The Department of Water Characters] 　湺; Kangxi strokes: 13; Pages: page 639 11
【Pentagram Sea】Yin saliva. ? The word Zhizhi.
